solution_line_template: He spends {shirt_ironing_time} minutes ironing his shirt and {pants_ironing_time} minutes ironing his pants so that's {shirt_ironing_time}+{pants_ironing_time} = <<{shirt_ironing_time}+{pants_ironing_time}={daily_ironing_time}>>{daily_ironing_time} minutes
He does this every day for {days_per_week} days so that's {days_per_week}*{daily_ironing_time} = <<{days_per_week}*{daily_ironing_time}={weekly_ironing_time}>>{weekly_ironing_time} minutes
After {num_weeks} weeks, Hayden has spent {num_weeks}*{weekly_ironing_time} = <<{num_weeks}*{weekly_ironing_time}={total_ironing_time}>>{total_ironing_time} minutes ironing his clothes
